alert.note: Alert for Edgefield; McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 5:07PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lincoln, northwestern Edgefield and central McCormick Counties through 530 PM EST... At 505 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elijah Clark State Park, or 23 miles east of Washington, moving northeast at 35 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... McCormick, Mccormick County Airport, Elijah Clark State Park, Parksville, Plum Branch, Double Branches, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Baker Creek State Park, Whitetown, Hawe Creek Campground, New Hope and Knox Scout Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
